translation.en: I have pineapples! I have strawberry!
- I have grapes! I have grapefruit! -
We had a plan, Carter, and you done goofed it.
The plan's still on.
The plan was for you to get me B's.
- Does this look like a freaking B? - I just want what's best for you.
translation.es: - ¿Esto es un maldito 9? - Solo quiero lo mejor para ti.

translation.en: You know when the last time I got an A was?
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuándo saqué un 10 por última vez?

translation.en: Okay, I'll act more stupid next time.
translation.es: La próxima vez actuaré más estúpido.

translation.en: Completely moronic and idiotic. Beyond obtuse.
translation.es: Completamente idiota. Obtuso hasta más no poder.

translation.en: Yeah. Totally.
That's what I'm talking about.
You making fun of me? You're dead this time, Carter.
translation.es: ¿Te burlas de mí? Esta vez estás muerto, Carter.

translation.en: What the...
- - Hey! You go on now, little mutt.
Go on. Go on, dog. I'll turn you into a hot dog. Now, go on.
translation.es: Fuera, perro. Te convertiré en perro caliente. Vete.

translation.en: I have grapefruit!
I have pineapples! I have strawberries!
Thank you very much.
Have a nice day. Be careful with the cars.
translation.es: Buen día. Cuidado con los autos.

translation.en: - You, too. - Okay.
- Hey. - There you are.
- You're late. Again. - Come on. I wanna go to Sam's.
translation.es: - Vuelves a llegar tarde. - Vamos. Quiero ir donde Sam.

translation.en: I was practicing for my recital.
I'm gonna do five pirouettes all on my own.
- It's called a solo. You know that, right? - That's cool, Frankie.
translation.es: - Se llama solo. Lo sabes, ¿no? - Genial, Frankie.

translation.en: And I'm gonna dance in New York, in Swan Lake, and be crazy famous.
translation.es: Bailaré en Nueva York, en El lago de los cisnes, seré famosa.

translation.en: But I'll still talk to you.
Why wouldn't you talk to me?
Because famous people are always stuck up.
I am not.
And I'm gonna wear my boots to do my pirouettes.
translation.es: Y usaré mis botas para hacer las piruetas.

translation.en: Good luck with that.
Hey. You are coming, right?
- To my recital? - Yeah, sure.
If you don't come and Mom has to work, nobody will be there.
translation.es: Si no vienes y mamá tiene que trabajar, no habrá nadie.

translation.en: You'll be great.
I'll be there, Frankie.
I promise.
That is if I invite you.
The tickets are for very important people only.
translation.es: Las entradas son para personas importantes.

translation.en: - Come on, let's get in the street car. - No, we can't!
translation.es: - Vamos. Subamos al tranvía. - ¡No, no podemos!

translation.en: - You're the one who wanted to go to Sam's. - Wait, Frankie.
translation.es: - Tú eras el que quería ir donde Sam. - Espera, Frankie.

translation.en: - I wanna walk. - It'll be fine. Come on.
translation.es: - Quiero ir caminando. - Estará bien. Vamos.

translation.en: Why do you have strawberries?
What are you talking about?
I saw you have strawberries in your pocket in the car.
translation.es: Vi que tenías fresas en el bolsillo.

translation.en: I don't have any strawberries.
I saw something red and green.
I don't have any strawberries in my pocket.
translation.es: No tengo fresas en el bolsillo.

translation.en: Well, it smeared on the chair and you didn't wipe it up.
translation.es: Pues ensució el asiento, y no lo limpiaste.

translation.en: What do you mean you don't believe me?
translation.es: EL TOUR DE FANTASMAS Y VAMPIROS MÁS POPULAR DEL PAÍS ¿Cómo que no me crees?

translation.en: You're gonna fly to Paris to dance? Not gonna happen.
translation.es: ¿Irás a París a bailar? No sucederá.

translation.en: It will happen. I know it.
You know you need to punch Pig- Face in the face, right?
translation.es: Tienes que golpear a Cara de Cerdo en la cara.

translation.en: - Frankie... I don't care. - He'll bully you your whole life.
I'm not gonna fight back. I'd lose.
translation.es: No voy a hacerle frente. Perdería.

translation.en: Why are we going here again? It's just a waste of time.
translation.es: ¿Por qué vinimos otra vez? Es una pérdida de tiempo.

translation.en: Because you never know, it could change sometimes.
translation.es: Porque nunca se sabe, podría cambiar.

translation.en: - Maybe he's in a good mood today. - In your dreams.
translation.es: - Quizá esté de buen humor. - En tus sueños.

translation.en: Hi, Mr. King. We're here for the watch.
translation.es: Hola, Sr. King. Venimos por el reloj.

translation.en: $4 and 26, 27, 28 cents.
That brings the total to $34 and 18... No, 19 cents.
translation.es: Es un total de $34 y 18... no, 19 centavos.

translation.en: Not bad, am I right?
- How much more do we have to go? - Oh, you don't even wanna know.
- - Mr. King,
we've been coming here twice a week for a long time.
translation.es: hemos venido dos veces por semana desde hace tiempo.

translation.en: You can at least take the watch out of the For Sale case.
translation.es: Al menos podría sacarlo de la vitrina.

translation.en: Please. He meant to say please.
translation.es: Por favor. Quiso decir por favor.

translation.en: I take it out of the case, people can't see it.
translation.es: Si lo saco, la gente no lo ve.

translation.en: People can't see it, people can't buy it.
translation.es: Si no lo ven, no pueden comprarlo.

translation.en: But we're gonna buy it. Eventually.
translation.es: Pero nosotros lo compraremos. En algún momento.

translation.en: Listen, I told both of you when we started this whole cockamamieness,
translation.es: Se los dije cuando comenzamos con esta tontería,

translation.en: that if somebody wants the watch, I'll let you know.
translation.es: si alguien quiere el reloj, les avisaré.

translation.en: - Give you a chance to buy it first. - Yeah, but we should have--
translation.es: - Les permitiré comprarlo antes. - Sí, pero deberíamos...

translation.en: There's no buts.
When I bought it from your mother, I paid her good money.
translation.es: Cuando se lo compré a su madre, le pagué bien.

translation.en: This is a business. Barely, but it is.
translation.es: Tengo un negocio. A duras penas, pero eso es.

translation.en: Mr. King, I promise you'll get money. We're at, like, $34 and 19 cents.
translation.es: Sr. King, le prometo que conseguiré dinero. Ya tenemos $34,19.

translation.en: - Baby, you see how old I am? - Old.
A hundred?
You're not really helping your case.
The point is, at this rate, you guys will be bringing my money to the cemetery.
translation.es: A esta ritmo, me traerán el dinero al cementerio.

translation.en: I don't like the cemetery.
Listen, a guy came in, he liked the watch. I told him it ran slow.
translation.es: A un sujeto le gustó el reloj. Le dije que atrasaba.

translation.en: It doesn't run slow.
My father kept it in perfect condition, and you know that.
translation.es: Mi padre lo conservaba perfectamente, y lo sabe.

translation.en: The point is, pudding head, he's not wearing it, is he?
translation.es: El punto es, tontito, que no se lo llevó, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Mr. King, of all the people I don't like in this world,
translation.es: Sr. King, de toda la gente que no me agrada en el mundo,

translation.en: I like you the best.
translation.es: usted es el que más me agrada.

translation.en: You and every other woman in my life.
translation.es: Tú y otras mujeres me lo han dicho.

translation.en: Now, you two, get out of here.
- We're just gonna keep coming back. - Yeah, like a rash.
translation.es: - Volveremos otra vez. - Sí, como un sarpullido.

translation.en: - See ya tomorrow. - Take care.
- That was a waste of time. - No, it wasn't. We added more money.
translation.es: - Eso fue una pérdida de tiempo. - No. Agregamos dinero.

translation.en: Next time, it'll be less money that we have to add.
translation.es: La próxima, tendremos que agregar menos.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah.
You've been giving Mr. King your lunch money. I know you have.
translation.es: Le has estado dando al Sr. King tu dinero del almuerzo.

translation.en: Maybe I wouldn't have to if Mom hadn't sold Dad's watch.
translation.es: No lo haría si mamá no hubiera vendido el reloj de papá.

translation.en: Lots of things aren't very good in life. Get used to it.
translation.es: Muchas cosas no son buenas en la vida. Acostúmbrate.

translation.en: You get used to being grounded forever or longer when Mom finds out.
translation.es: Tú acostúmbrate a estar castigado cuando mamá se entere.

translation.en: I was here first.
I'm older, so it doesn't matter. I'm always first.
translation.es: Soy mayor, así que siempre voy primero.

translation.en: Mom doesn't like it when you double dip.
translation.es: Mamá no quiere que mojes en la salsa.

translation.en: Mom's not here, so if you just shut your mouth for once, you'll be fine.
translation.es: Mamá no está, así que si cierras la boca por esta vez, estarás bien.

translation.en: Fine. I can keep my mouth shut so much that I'll never talk to you
translation.es: Bien. Puedo cerrar tanto la boca que nunca volveré a hablarte

translation.en: for all the time in all the universes in all the world.
translation.es: en la vida de todos los universos de todo el mundo.

translation.en: Thank goodness.
Carter can't come to the phone right now.
Please don't leave a message after the beep. Beep!
translation.es: Por favor, no deje mensaje después de la señal. ¡Bip!

translation.en: Just look!
If you are satisfied with your message, please press 1 or hang up.
translation.es: Si está satisfecha con su mensaje, presione 1 o corte.

translation.en: Carter, just listen to me!
What?
No way.
I can't believe it. How did you even get up here?
You know this dog?
I was trying to get him to follow us home from school.
translation.es: Intentaba que nos siguiera desde la escuela.

translation.en: - I knew you were doing something not good. - Come on. Good boy.
translation.es: - Sabía que hacías algo malo. - Ven. Buen chico.

translation.en: Come here. Good boy.
- What's your name, bud? - He's a stray.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo te llamas, amigo? - Es de la calle.

translation.en: Where did you come from?
A trash can?
He smells worse than your side of the room.
translation.es: Huele peor que tu lado del cuarto.

translation.en: You're right. Let's fix it.
♪ I love my dog as much as I love you ♪
translation.es: Amo a mi perro tanto como a ti

translation.en: ♪ But you may fade My dog will always come through ♪
translation.es: Pero tú podrás desaparecer Mi perro siempre estará allí

translation.en: ♪ All the pay I need Comes shining through his eyes ♪
translation.es: La recompensa que necesito Viene del brillo en sus ojos

translation.en: ♪ I don't need no cold water To make me realize ♪
translation.es: No necesito agua fría Para darme cuenta

translation.en: ♪ That I love my dog As much as I love you ♪
translation.es: De que amo a mi perro Tanto como a ti

translation.en: ♪ But you may fade My dog will always come through ♪
translation.es: Pero tú podrás desaparecer Mi perro siempre estará allí

translation.en: Carter, what are we gonna do about Mom?
What about her?
She's gonna freak out.
You asked for a bulldog for Christmas, and you got a stuffed animal.
translation.es: Pediste un bulldog para Navidad, y te dieron uno de juguete.

translation.en: Which is why we're not gonna tell her. He's just gonna stay in our room for now.
translation.es: Por eso no se lo diremos. Por ahora se quedará en nuestro cuarto.

translation.en: Where's he gonna pee and poo?
In your bed?
Carter!
Just until I can convince her.
It's Mom. We'll never convince her. Like, ever.
translation.es: Es mamá. Nunca la convencerás. Nunca.

translation.en: - Oh, crap. - Oh, no.
Hey, hey!
Where are my two favorite people that help Mom out?
- Hey, Mom. - Hi, Mommy!
You're the best mommy of all the mommies in all the world!
translation.es: ¡Eres la mejor madre de todas las madres del mundo!

translation.en: Definitely, you're the best.
What'd you break?
Nothing.
So there were four accidents today. Four!
I was driving the ambulance 80 miles per hour.
That's a lot, Mom.
Forks on the left, hon.
- Car, is all your homework done? - It will be.
Here you go, Madame. Mushrooms on top.
How about you, Mr. Man. Anything exciting happen at school today?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay de ti, hombrecito? ¿Cómo estuvo la escuela?

translation.en: Pig- Face happened.
Your death is about to happen.
Again? That's the third time. Okay, that's it. I'm calling the school.
translation.es: ¿Otra vez? Es la tercera vez. Llamaré a la escuela.

translation.en: Don't blow this up like you blow everything up.
translation.es: No exageres con esto como exageras todo.

translation.en: I'm not blowing anything up.
I wanna know who this kid is.
I told you, Pig- Face.
- Can you butt out, Frankie? - Carter, what happened? Tell me the truth.
translation.es: - No te metas, Frankie. - Carter, ¿qué pasó? Dime la verdad.

translation.en: - Carter, just-- - You don't wanna know the truth.
translation.es: - Carter... - No quieres saber la verdad.

translation.en: - No. - Straight up, Carter.
- Are you scared of this kid? - No.
'Cause if you are, that's nothing...
- Go. - ...to be ashamed of.
- Just let me help you. - No. No.
Here you go. No mushrooms.
Um, actually, can I have mushrooms, please?
- You hate mushrooms. - But taste buds change every seven years.
translation.es: - Odias los hongos. - Las papilas gustativas cambian.

translation.en: - That's a scientific fact. - He's right. Very, very right.
translation.es: - Es un dato científico. - Tiene razón.

translation.en: Mushrooms.
Okay.
I'm just worried about you, Carter.
translation.es: Solo me preocupo por ti, Carter.

translation.en: - You're worried about everything. - That is not true.
translation.es: - Todo te preocupa. - No es cierto.

translation.en: Okay, maybe that is a little bit true. A little bit.
translation.es: Bueno, quizá es un poco cierto. Un poco.

translation.en: Anyway, here you go.
What is going on with you guys?
- Nothing. - Nothing.
I feel like you're hiding something from me.
Okay. Mom, let's just calm down and eat our food.
translation.es: Mamá, vamos a calmarnos y comer la comida.

translation.en: - - Okay, I...
I know that things have been hard,
translation.es: Sé que las cosas han sido complejas,

translation.en: and you guys wake up in the morning and I'm already at work,
translation.es: y que se despiertan por la mañana, y ya estoy trabajando,

translation.en: and you've been on your own a lot lately.
translation.es: que han estado solos mucho tiempo.

translation.en: But I just want you to know that you can talk to me, you know?
translation.es: Pero quiero que sepan que pueden hablar conmigo.

translation.en: Really, I'm right here.
We do talk to you, Mom.
Don't worry.
We love you, Mom, to the moon and back.
translation.es: Te queremos, mamá, más de lo que crees.

translation.en: To the moon and back.
This is the Aitken Basin, formed 4.5 billion years ago,
translation.es: Esta es la cuenca Aitken, formada hace 4500 millones de años,

translation.en: which in dog years is a lot.
My dad showed it to me on an electron telescope
translation.es: Mi padre me la mostró en un telescopio

translation.en: at the planetarium he ran.
Wanna know something more interesting?
This is my favorite ballerina book. Isn't she pretty?
translation.es: Este es mi libro favorito de bailarinas. ¿No es linda?

translation.en: - Hey, stop chewing on that. -
And this is the Nutcracker.
It's about an evil rat king.
translation.es: Es sobre un rey rata malo.

translation.en: - Die, Rat King, die. -
Mom will hear you.
Hey, what if we named him Michael Jordan?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si le ponemos Michael Jordan?

translation.en: That's the dumbest name for a dog I've ever heard.
translation.es: Es el nombre de perro más tonto que he oído.

translation.en: Okay. What about Copernicus?
What is going on in your mind? No.
This is my favorite, Sleeping Beauty. There's a lot of kissing.
translation.es: Este es mi favorito, La bella durmiente. Hay muchos besos.

translation.en: Look, Benjamin Franklin had a dog.
He thought they were more reliable than people.
translation.es: Pensaba que eran más confiables que la gente.

translation.en: That's not very interesting.
Yeah, but what about Benjamin, as his name?
translation.es: Sí, pero ¿qué te parece Benjamin como nombre?

translation.en: Mmm... What about Benji?
He does look kind of like a Benji. He's old and new at the same time.
translation.es: Tiene aspecto de Benji. Es viejo y nuevo al mismo tiempo.

translation.en: - Yeah. -
Good boy. Good boy.
Dad would let us keep Benji.
translation.es: Papá nos dejaría conservar a Benji.

translation.en: I don't wanna say goodbye to Benji.
I don't like goodbye.
Promise me we won't have to.
translation.es: Prométeme que no tendremos que hacerlo.

translation.en: Hey, I promise you, Fritter.
I love you, guys.
I love you too, Frankie.
And now I lay me down to sleep,
translation.es: Y ahora que voy a dormir,

translation.en: I pray the Lord for this dog to keep.
translation.es: le pido al Señor que cuide a este perro.

translation.en: And that I will do incredible at my recital.
translation.es: Y que me vaya muy bien en el recital.

translation.en: And that my spelling teacher will quit her job forever and never come back.
translation.es: Y que mi maestra de Lengua renuncie y nunca vuelva.

translation.en: And that Mommy will not have to worry so much.
translation.es: Y que mamá no tenga que preocuparse tanto.

translation.en: And that I'll never have to eat any more mushrooms as long as I live.
translation.es: Y que nunca tenga que comer más hongos en mi vida.

translation.en: Amen.
Good night, Benji.
I don't know what to do, you know?
They're getting so big, and they're so smart,
translation.es: Están creciendo tanto y son tan inteligentes,

translation.en: and they catch on to things and...
And I'm trying to keep everything together.
It's like I'm nothing but a nag.
All of a sudden, I'm so serious.
Every day I feel like I'm messing them up and letting them down.
translation.es: Todos los días siento que los arruino y los decepciono.

translation.en: I don't know how to be in three places at once.
translation.es: No sé cómo estar en tres lugares a la vez.

translation.en: So, feel free to give me some advice
translation.es: Así que puedes darme un consejo

translation.en: or one of your lame science jokes, or...
translation.es: o alguna de tus bromas científicas o...

translation.en: a carton of ice cream and bingeing...
translation.es: ...un bote de helado para darme un atracón...

translation.en: 'cause I could really use it.
Just a quick kiss before I go to work.
translation.es: Un beso rápido antes de ir a trabajar.

translation.en: - Carter? - Good morning, Mom.
What is that?
A stuffed animal.  An animatronic one.
translation.es: Un animal de peluche. Es animatrónico.

translation.en: Okay. All right. I'm on to you two.
This is why you guys were being weird last night.
He's cute. Mom, look at him.
You know what? I expected Carter to lie to me
because he's almost a teenager, but you?
Mom, we're not lying. We just didn't tell you yet.
translation.es: Mamá, no te mentimos. No te lo habíamos dicho aún.

translation.en: Where did he come from?
Uh, he kind of found me.
On the street, we saved him.
On the street?
No. Okay.
- - All right, I got it.
You're cute, but you are a dog and you poop everywhere,
translation.es: Eres adorable, pero eres un perro y haces caca en todos lados,

translation.en: and you mess everything up, you chew on things,
you keep us up at night.
He loves you, Mommy.
No. Okay? I can barely keep the three of us afloat.
translation.es: No. Apenas puedo mantenernos a nosotros tres a flote.

translation.en: It's not happening.
Mom, you don't have to worry. We'll take care of him.
translation.es: Mamá, no tienes que preocuparte. Nosotros nos encargaremos.

translation.en: I don't have the money or the time.
translation.es: No tengo ni tiempo ni dinero.

translation.en: It's not happening. I'm taking him to a shelter.
translation.es: No será posible. Lo llevaré a un refugio.

translation.en: They murder- kill dogs there. You can't take him there.
translation.es: Allí asesinan a los perros. No puedes llevarlo.

translation.en: - No, they don't. - Are you kidding me?
A shelter?
They won't even give him three days.
translation.es: No le darán ni tres días.

translation.en: I won't let them hurt him.
Yeah, you will. You don't care.
translation.es: Sí lo harás. No te importa.

translation.en: He's a good boy, and you won't even give him a chance.
translation.es: Él es bueno, y no le das una oportunidad.

translation.en: Carter, no, okay?
I'm sorry... I don't...
I can't take care of one more thing right now.
translation.es: No puedo encargarme de otra cosa más.

translation.en: He's not a thing. He's Benji.
translation.es: No es una cosa. Es Benji.

translation.en: You named him?
I'm so sorry that you can't handle one more thing right now,
translation.es: Lamento mucho que no puedas con otra cosa ahora,

translation.en: but what about us?
We take care of each other,
so I'm pretty sure that we can handle a dog.
translation.es: así que podemos con un perro.

translation.en: Maybe he'll make things fun around here for once.
translation.es: Quizá él haga que las cosas sean divertidas de una vez.

translation.en: Oh, I forgot. That's not allowed, either.
translation.es: Me había olvidado. Tampoco se permite.

translation.en: Carter, no... That's not fair.
- Just leave us alone. -
I don't even like that stupid dog.
translation.es: Ni siquiera me agrada ese perro tonto.

translation.en: Mom won't let you stay.
translation.es: Mamá no deja que te quedes.

translation.en: You'll wind up in a pound.
Just go.
Go, please.
I love you, Benji.
♪ If your heart believes in dreamin' ♪
translation.es: Si tu corazón cree en los sueños

translation.en: ♪ There's no other place I know ♪
♪ Well, life here rolls on by Without a care for tomorrow ♪
translation.es: La vida aquí sigue Sin importar el mañana

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, that was the life for me That was the life for me ♪
translation.es: Sí, esa era mi vida Esa era mi vida

translation.en: ♪ How long must I travel On this journey? ♪
♪ Guess I'll count a million stars Along the way ♪
translation.es: Supongo que contaré un millón de estrellas Al pasar

translation.en: ♪ And every time I start to worry ♪
translation.es: Y cada vez que comienzo a preocuparme

translation.en: ♪ Something whispers in my ear ♪
♪ Says the words I long to hear ♪
translation.es: Dice las palabras que quiero oír

translation.en: ♪ Almost home ♪
♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ Might be lost and afraid ♪
♪ But I'm just a dream away ♪
translation.es: Pero estoy a un sueño de distancia

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ Just one more mile And I'll be home free ♪
translation.es: Solo un kilómetro más Y estaré libre en casa

translation.en: ♪ Just one more day Is all my heart needs ♪
translation.es: Un día más es lo que necesita mi corazón

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get there ♪
♪ Yeah, I'm gonna get there someday ♪
♪ Feel so cold and alone But I'm... ♪
translation.es: Tengo tanto frío y estoy tan solo Pero casi...

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
- Did you not eat lunch again? - I ate lunch.
- Then how come you got more money for Sam? - I don't.
translation.es: - Y ¿por qué tienes más dinero para Sam? - No lo tengo.

translation.en: Then how come we're going to Sam's?
To get my money back.
If you get our money back, how do we get Dad's watch back?
translation.es: Si lo haces, ¿cómo recuperamos el reloj de papá?

translation.en: Mom doesn't care. She wouldn't let us keep Benji.
translation.es: A mamá no le importa. No nos dejó conservar a Benji.

translation.en: Why should I care about getting her the watch back?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me importaría recuperar el reloj?

translation.en: Because we're a family.
Whatever.
You're just scared of somebody else buying it.
translation.es: Solo te da miedo que alguien más lo compre.

translation.en: I'm not scared. I'm realistic, Frankie.
translation.es: No tengo miedo. Soy realista, Frankie.

translation.en: I told you she wouldn't let us keep him.
translation.es: Te dije que no nos dejaría conservarlo.

translation.en: You're not real or listic or whatever. You're just chicken.
translation.es: No eres ni real ni lista ni nada. Eres un cobarde.

translation.en: You give up at everything when not very good things happen.
translation.es: Siempre te rindes cuando pasan cosas no tan buenas.

translation.en: - Mr. King, we need to talk. - ...hold up.
Hey, you kids, I sold the watch.
You two go on back home now.
- You what? - Sold the watch.
You sold the watch? That's not right.
translation.es: ¿Vendió el reloj? Eso no está bien.

translation.en: - Y'all go on now. Go home. - You know what?
I'm gonna call the police and tell them you are a lying liar.
translation.es: Llamaré a la policía y les diré que es un mentiroso.

translation.en: You can't sell the watch.
- How y'all doing? -
Now, I remember being a kid.
I used to tell my brother there I was gonna beat him with a baseball bat,
translation.es: Le decía a mi hermano que lo iba a golpear con un bate,

translation.en: but I didn't really mean it.
When you say you're gonna go get the police,
translation.es: Cuando dices que irás a la policía,

translation.en: that's just you being a kid, right?
Yeah, just talking.
Good, but just in case, y'all are gonna stick around for a while.
translation.es: Bien, pero por las dudas, se quedarán aquí un rato.

translation.en: Man, you don't need to handle kids like that.
translation.es: No trates así a los niños.

translation.en: - Shh. - Let go.
You don't have to do that. Leave 'em alone!
translation.es: No tienes que hacer eso. ¡Déjalos en paz!

translation.en: Open the safe. Fill the bag. Do it.
translation.es: Abra la caja fuerte. Llene la bolsa.

translation.en: - Not until you let them kids go. - Mr. Pawn Man,
put yourself in the shoes of two fellas who would come in here wearing
translation.es: póngase en la posición de dos sujetos que vienen aquí

translation.en: these ridiculous masks. Do I look like I'm playing?
translation.es: con estas máscaras. ¿Cree que es un juego?

translation.en: Open the safe! Hurry up.
Y'all calm down.
- Open up the safe, now! - Don't hurt them kids.
Do it, before I hop that counter
and slap the taste out your mouth. Come on, hurry up!
translation.es: y le daré un golpe que lo dejará mudo. ¡Rápido!

translation.en: Speed it up. Come on!
Comin'.
You got what you came for. Now go on.
translation.es: Tienen lo que querían. Ahora váyanse.

translation.en: Tie him up. Let's go.
Move. Come on, back door.
- Man, wait. - Tie him up.
- Where you taking them kids? - Move! The backdoor. Go. Get out.
translation.es: - ¿Adónde llevas a los niños? - ¡Caminen! Salgan por atrás.

translation.en: Sit down. Sit down. Sit down.
Let us go.
Y'all gonna sit here, stay quiet for ten minutes,
translation.es: Se quedarán en silencio por diez minutos

translation.en: and then forget any of this ever happened.
If you don't, me and my brother will pay a little visit to your home. Understand?
translation.es: Si no, mi hermano y yo iremos a su casa. ¿Entendido?

translation.en: - Help! - Hurry up.
- Over here! - Mr. King!
Frankie, stop!
Get up. Get up.
- Help! Help us! - Let us go!
- Get in the van. - Carter?
- Wait. What are you doing? - They saw my face.
translation.es: - Espera. ¿Qué haces? - Me vieron la cara.

translation.en: - Help! Someone, help us! - They kids.
Now they've seen your face, too. Get in the van.
translation.es: Ahora también te vieron a ti. Sube.

translation.en: Please let us go.
- We didn't do anything. - Go on. Get in the van.
Please.
Help! Help!
Damn.
Is that your dog?
- Easy! -
Get out the way!
- You get this is kidnapping, right? - It's more like saving our butts.
translation.es: - Sabes que es secuestro, ¿no? - Más bien es salvarnos.

translation.en: - - Find the phone, Titus. Hurry up.
- Mommy! - Get rid of it.
- Get it out the window, idiot. - I'm getting it!
translation.es: - Tíralo por la ventana, idiota. - ¡Eso hago!

translation.en: Please stop.
We in too deep now, brother. We can't do that.
translation.es: Ahora ya estamos metidos, hermano. No podemos.

translation.en: He's gone.
- Stop driving! - We can't stop!
- We can stop! - No, we can't!
Syd, where are you taking us?
Don't worry. I got this covered, I promise.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Sé lo que hago, te lo juro.

translation.en: Why are you so ugly?
Wanna say that again?
Hey! What are you doing back there?
Nothing. It's just my lunch.
- What is that? - Do not take your eye off of him.
translation.es: - ¿Qué es eso? - No lo pierdas de vista.

translation.en: Don't you never call me ugly. Never!
Hurry up. Hurry up. Hurry up.
Tie 'em up in that back room.
- Hurry up. - Let me go!
- Double knots. Put the tarp on the van. - They ain't going anywhere.
translation.es: - Nudos dobles. Cubre la camioneta. - No irán a ningún lado.

translation.en: Give me your hands.
Please.
I'm almost done with my shift, and I haven't heard from you guys.
translation.es: Ya casi termino mi turno y no sé nada de ustedes.

translation.en: I know that you're mad at me, but you have to tell me where you are.
translation.es: Sé que están enojados, pero tienen que decirme dónde están.

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry.
And I love you.
So call me, okay?
What'd you pick this place for? Gives me the creeps.
translation.es: ¿Por qué elegiste este lugar? Me da escalofríos.

translation.en: So nobody comes sniffing around.
translation.es: Para que nadie venga a husmear.

translation.en: - What're you doing, man? - Checking our score.
I mean with them. I didn't sign up for no kidnapping.
translation.es: Me refiero a los niños. No me apunté a un secuestro.

translation.en: Let me make something real clear to you.
There are people that want money from us,
but we ain't got no money, do we?
So they gonna break every bone in our body instead.
translation.es: Así que nos romperán todos los huesos del cuerpo.

translation.en: That what you signed up for?
I don't owe those people nothing. That's all you.
translation.es: No le debo nada a esa gente. Ese eres tú.

translation.en: Who took care of you seven years, huh?
translation.es: ¿Quién cuidó de ti por siete años?

translation.en: Food, clothes, all that?
I was the one who figured out a way
for us to keep on even when our own parents wouldn't.
translation.es: de que siguiéramos cuando nuestros padres no lo hacían.

translation.en: What I owe, you owe.
translation.es: Lo que yo debo, tú también.

translation.en: - All right. So what's the plan? - Sell all this, pay off our debt.
translation.es: - Y ¿cuál es el plan? - Vender todo esto, pagar la deuda.

translation.en: Keep them around in case we need a get- out- of- jail- free card.
translation.es: Los mantendremos aquí para evitar ir a prisión.

translation.en: And then what?
And then we no longer need 'em.
translation.es: Y después ya no los necesitaremos.

translation.en: She's cold.
So what?
- So what? - I like this here watch.
A lot.
It actually reminds me of a watch my daddy had.
translation.es: Me recuerda a uno que tenía mi padre.

translation.en: Give it back!
Was this the reason y'all was in the shop today?
translation.es: ¿Por esto estaban hoy en la tienda?

translation.en: To the man of my dreams.
translation.es: Para el hombre de mis sueños.

translation.en: I love you more than the moon and the stars.
translation.es: Te amo más que a nada en el mundo.

translation.en: Love, W. That's nice.
Let me work this here.
Your daddy run off. Got sick and tired of you, your old mama.
translation.es: Su padre se fue. Se cansó de ustedes y de su madre.

translation.en: So she sold it. It's good riddance.
translation.es: Así que ella lo vendió. Adiós.

translation.en: But then, y'all want a little something something to remember him by.
translation.es: Pero ustedes quieren algo para poder recordarlo.

translation.en: Ain't that right, little man?
Tell me how bad you want it.
Come on. Tell me.
It's yours, ain't it?
You can take it from me.
Take it. Take it.
Yeah.
What you scared of?
You're a little coward, huh?
Just like your old man.
Sic, Rott! Sic him!
- We okay? - You, too, dumbo.
Go. Go!
Dumb move, dog.
Where are you?
Help!
Day keeps getting better.
translation.es: El día se pone cada vez mejor.

translation.en: Little doggie.
Where you at, baby boy?
Come out and play.
Little doggie.
Where are you?
I'm gonna skin you alive.
Gonna wipe that stupid grin off your face.
Where you at?
Benji!
Come here, boy. Get this. Please, get this.
Good boy.
I hate that dog!
- Please, Benji, hurry. - It's stuck. He can't get it.
translation.es: - Benji, apresúrate. - Está atorado. No puede.

translation.en: - Please, Benji. - Come on!
- - Where is he?
Oh, I think Rottie smells him.
- Where could he be? -
- Get him, Rott. - No!
Run, Benji, run!
- - Don't hurt him!
Run, Benji!
Help! Get me out of here.
Hey, who is that?
- - Is that a dog?
What are you doing in here?
Puppy, bark for me!
Where'd you go, puppy? Come on, puppy.
Where'd you go? I know you're out there.
What are you doing out there?
Come on, puppy. Come on, puppy. Come on.
Hey, puppy, come on back now.
What're you...
Are you trying to get the lock?
Come on, puppy, you can do it! I know you can.
translation.es: Vamos, cachorro, ¡tú puedes! Sé que puedes.

translation.en: Come on, pup. Don't leave me now. Don't give up, puppy.
translation.es: Vamos, cachorro. No me dejes. No te rindas.

translation.en: Come on, baby. I know you can do it. Come on, puppy. You almost got it. Get it.
translation.es: Vamos. Sé que puedes hacerlo. Vamos, cachorro. Casi lo logras.

translation.en: Come on, pup. Come on, I know you can do it.
Puppy, thank you! You opened the door!
Yes, yes, hey. Good boy.
Wait. Where's Carter and Frankie?
Yes, sir. I'll keep you posted. Yeah.
Sam King? Sam King?
Detective Lyle Burton. How you doing?
- Hey. Listen. You got to find the kids. - Trust me, we're gonna find them.
translation.es: - Hola. Debe encontrar a los niños. - Créame, los encontraremos.

translation.en: Did you see what the guys look like?
- No, they were wearing-- - I got something.
Okay. Hold on for a second, okay? What you got? What you got?
I found it out back.
- Sam! Where's Frankie and Carter? - Lord, Ms. Hughes, I'm so sorry.
translation.es: - ¡Sam! ¿Dónde están Frankie y Carter? - Sra. Hughes, lo siento.

translation.en: - What happened? - Ms. Hughes, I'm Detective Lyle Burton.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasó? - Sra. Hughes, soy el Dtve. Burton.

translation.en: - We're gonna do everything we can-- - Why were they even here?
translation.es: - Haremos todo lo posible... - ¿Por qué estaban aquí?

translation.en: - It's the watch. - The watch?
Your husband's watch.
The kids have been coming in every day almost trying to buy it back.
translation.es: Los niños han venido casi todos los días para recuperarlo.

translation.en: I told them that I sold it. I didn't know that they'd come in here to...
translation.es: Les dije que lo había vendido. No sabía que vendrían...

translation.en: - Hey! What... - Get him. What...
- What is he doing here? - That dog saved me.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hace aquí? - Ese perro me salvó.

translation.en: - Is he yours? - No. What... He what?
He got me out of the dang closet they locked me in.
translation.es: Me sacó del armario en el que me habían encerrado.

translation.en: We need to follow procedure, okay?
I think he's trying to tell you something.
Ms. Hughes! Ms. Hughes!
Stay put. Requesting backup. I got a 2- 12 on foot.
translation.es: No se muevan. Solicito refuerzos. Tengo un 2-12 a pie.

translation.en: Suspect identification?
Uh, brown hair, 35 pounds, four legs.
You wanna repeat that, Burton?
Not especially.
We're parked down there.
Ms. Hughes, let me do my job.
I'm following that dog.
Listen, we'll find them.
- We will follow the dog. Just come on. - Fine. Let's go.
translation.es: - Seguiremos al perro. Vamos. - Bien. Vamos.

translation.en: - Hey, hold up, hold up. - Sam?
About to catch a heart attack.
translation.es: Me iba a dar un ataque cardíaco.

translation.en: Get in the car. Let's go!
Hey, hey. No, no, no, you wait. Wait here. I got it.
translation.es: No, espere aquí. Yo me encargo.

translation.en: Must be out of my doggoned mind.
translation.es: Quizá estoy mal de la cabeza.

translation.en: The heck you sniffing around for?
What you got?
What? What is that?
Pudding? Does it look like I want pudding?
- - What will I do with that?
Is that why you brought us here?
Okay.
And then you walk off. Great.
Stop. Just stop.
No, stop. Just stop!
Do you have any idea how much time I've wasted?
translation.es: ¿Tienes idea del tiempo que he perdido?

translation.en: My kids are...
I don't wanna see you ever again. Go.
translation.es: No quiero volver a verte. Vete.

translation.en: Do you hear me? Go!
What the heck were you thinking, Street? We got procedure, son.
Sir, I know. I got carried away.
translation.es: Lo sé, señor. Me dejé llevar.

translation.en: Ms. Hughes? Here's a cup of jasmine tea. It manifests good fortune.
translation.es: ¿Sra. Hughes? Tome té de jazmín. Es para la buena suerte.

translation.en: - Thank you. - You're welcome.
How much money had they saved up?
It doesn't matter. I should've given them the watch back.
translation.es: No importa. Debí devolverles el reloj.

translation.en: No, I never should have sold it.
I should've done something
so they didn't think that buying a watch would make it all okay.
translation.es: para que no pensaran que comprar el reloj solucionaría todo.

translation.en: The honest truth is, Ms. Hughes...
I didn't give the watch back, 'cause I like having 'em come in.
translation.es: No les devolví el reloj porque me gustaba que vinieran.

translation.en: Those two, they got nothing but love in 'em.
- I got something. - It's Carter's.
A traffic cop found it.
No usable prints, but it's a starting point, location- wise.
translation.es: No tiene huellas digitales, pero es un comienzo para ubicarlos.

translation.en: Hey, come on. Give me my phone back.
Don't eat the rubber ducky. Give me that back. Good boy. Good boy.
translation.es: No comas el patito de goma. Devuélvemelo. Buen chico.

translation.en: - Who's a good boy? - What's his name, anyways?
translation.es: - ¿Quién es un buen perro? - ¿Cómo se llama?

translation.en: I don't think he has one. He's a stray.
translation.es: Creo que no tiene nombre. Es de la calle.

translation.en: Hey, where did you come from, buddy? Do you need a home?
What are you thinking? What if Mom finds out?
translation.es: ¿Qué estás pensando? ¿Y si mamá se entera?

translation.en: I'm thinking he's lonely.
What are we gonna name him?
Like there's even a reason to name him. Mom will never let us keep him.
translation.es: No hay razón para ponerle nombre. Mamá no nos dejará conservarlo.

translation.en: It's kind of like...
when Dad got sick, Mom did, too.
I miss Dad, but I miss Mom even more.
translation.es: Extraño a papá, pero extraño más a mamá.

translation.en: I know, Fritter. I know.
♪ When the road gets dark ♪
translation.es: Cuando el camino se pone oscuro

translation.en: ♪ And you can no longer see ♪
♪ Just let my love throw a spark ♪
translation.es: Deja que mi amor tire una chispa

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.es: Y ten algo de fe en mí

translation.en: ♪ When the tears you cry ♪
♪ Are all you can believe ♪
translation.es: Son lo único en lo que puedes creer

translation.en: ♪ Just give these lovin' arms a try Baby ♪
translation.es: Dale una chance a estos brazos cariñosos

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.es: Y ten algo de fe en mí

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.es: Y ten algo de fe en mí

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.es: Y ten algo de fe en mí

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.es: Y ten algo de fe en mí

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.es: Y ten algo de fe en mí

translation.en: ♪ And when your back's against the wall ♪
translation.es: Y cuando tienes la espalda contra la pared

translation.en: Hey, dog!
♪ Just turn around and you will see ♪
♪ I will catch you I will catch your fall, baby ♪
translation.es: Te atraparé Te atraparé cuando caigas, cariño

translation.en: ♪ Just have a little faith in me ♪
translation.es: Solo ten un poco de fe en mí

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.es: Y ten un poco de fe en mí

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.es: Y ten un poco de fe en mí

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.es: Y ten un poco de fe en mí

translation.en: Come on, what'd I tell you? Hear me, boy?
- We'll get out of here. - I don't wanna go anymore.
translation.es: - Saldremos de aquí. - Ya no quiero ir.

translation.en: Look at my face. See how much I care?
Go on. Come on, Titus. Let's go.
Uh... What are we doing, man?
Listen. I know a guy, all right?
He's gonna buy our score and take us up river.
translation.es: Nos comprará el botín y nos llevará río arriba.

translation.en: I mean, with them.
They're coming with us. Come on.
What are you saying?
Don't worry your pretty little head about it.
What y'all doing over there?
- Nothing. - Nothing.
Nothing.
- Ain't we clever? -
No, please. No.
- No, please, please. - Please. Please.
Let me be real clear...
I don't need but one of y'all to be my insurance policy. You hear me?
translation.es: Solo necesito a uno para que sea mi seguro. ¿Oyeron?

translation.en: Get goin'. Go on.
Titus!
- Ms. Hughes... - I have to go find my kids.
translation.es: - Sra. Hughes... - Debo ir por mis hijos.

translation.en: - Just give me a second. - I can't just sit here any longer.
translation.es: - Deme un segundo. - No puedo seguir ahí sentada.

translation.en: - I have to go. - You have to be rational.
translation.es: - Debo ir. - Tiene que ser razonable.

translation.en: Ms. Hughes! I have a lead.
What?
This van. It was stolen two days ago.
translation.es: Esta camioneta. La robaron hace dos días.

translation.en: - And you think that they're in there? - Yeah.
It raced out of the quarter down towards the river.
translation.es: Huyó al sur de la ciudad, hacia el río.

translation.en: That's right where the dog was taking us.
- It's just a coincidence. - How is that a coincidence?
translation.es: - Es una coincidencia. - No es coincidencia.

translation.en: - Listen, the house was empty. - Maybe you didn't look hard enough.
translation.es: - La casa estaba vacía. - Quizá no buscó bien.

translation.en: You're talking as if you think a dog is smarter than the police.
translation.es: Parece que creyera que un perro es más listo que un policía.

translation.en: I'm going back to the house.
We need to follow protocol this time!
I don't think that dog was following any kind of protocol.
translation.es: No creo que ese perro siguiera ningún protocolo.

translation.en: I think he was following his heart.
If anybody ask, I'm following the lead, all right?
translation.es: Si alguien pregunta, yo sigo las pistas, ¿sí?

translation.en: Don't you worry. I'm real good at not telling the police things.
translation.es: No se preocupe. Soy bueno ocultándole cosas a la policía.

translation.en: Ms. Hughes!
Boat's coming in, Syd.
I'm on lookout. Flag him down. He's got the cash for the loot.
translation.es: Estoy vigilando. Hazle señas. Tiene el dinero.

translation.en: There's our ride.
Stay.
Carter, I always pretend like I'm not scared,
translation.es: Carter, siempre hago de cuenta que no tengo miedo,

translation.en: but I'm really scared.
I'm really scared.
Please, God.
Please help us get back home.
translation.es: Por favor, ayúdanos a volver a casa.

translation.en: Please, please, please.
Please.
This wasn't open before.
Are you sure?
I'm sure.
Oh, you got to be kidding me.
- What? What is that? - Hey, relax.
It's an underground transport tunnel,
built way back for things you don't even wanna know about.
translation.es: construido antiguamente para cosas que no querrá saber.

translation.en: - You think they went... Carter! Frankie! - What you doing?
- Those are my kids! - Relax. Listen. We can cut 'em off.
- There's a river. I'll make a call. Okay? - Okay.
translation.es: - Hay un río. Haré una llamada. ¿Sí? - Está bien.

translation.en: - Wait! Give me your keys. - Huh?
- I drive an ambulance for a living. - No.
No!
You call this driving?
Not yet.
Benji! Help!
Help us!
Help us, Benji! Help!
Here's your money. We leave in five.
translation.es: Aquí está su dinero. Nos vamos en cinco.

translation.en: You're not your brother.
My brother thinks I'm stupid.
translation.es: Mi hermano cree que soy estúpido.

translation.en: He thinks he's the boss of me.
- But I can make decisions for myself. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Pero puedo tomar mis propias decisiones. - Sí.

translation.en: That's why I'm taking this here cash...
all for me...
and bailin'...
so I don't never have to listen to another thing he says...
translation.es: ...para no tener que volver a escuchar nada de lo que dice...

translation.en: never again.
Who's ugly now?
Hey, my man! Can you help us out? Have you seen these two kids?
translation.es: ¡Oiga, amigo! ¿Puede ayudarnos? ¿Ha visto a estos niños?

translation.en: A van? Anything out of the ordinary?
No, sir, I never seen 'em.
Help! Help!
- That her dog? - Yeah. Whether she knows it or not.
translation.es: - ¿Ese es su perro? - Sí. Aunque no lo sepa.

translation.en: Okay, I'm requesting backup. I'm at the boatyard, right off...
translation.es: Solicito refuerzos. Estoy en el astillero, junto a...

translation.en: Hey!
- - It's a little late, you idiot.
Come on, I thought we was friends.
- Gotcha, slick. -
You got the right to pretty much nothing.
translation.es: Tienes derecho a casi nada, prácticamente.

translation.en: Benji!
Cut the rope, idiot!
Don't you ever quit?
- - Benji!
You thought that dog was gonna save you?
You're not going anywhere.
- Yeah, we are. - What are you gonna do, big man?
About time.
- Frankie, Carter! - Mommy!
Benji! Benji!
I love you, Benji.
Benji?
- Benji? Ben? -
Benji?
He didn't give up.
- Good boy. Good boy. - Benji.
- I love you. - I don’t have to say goodbye.
translation.es: - Te quiero. - No tengo que despedirme.

translation.en: - Thank God. - Thank you.
- Hi! -
Get your hands off me.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. I got him. I got him.
Thank you.
This is going back where it belongs.
Watch your head.
Hello.
Did good today. Good boy.
What you doing?
Oh, I had no idea.
You're a good girl. You're a very good girl.
translation.es: Eres una buena chica. Buena chica.

translation.en: Thank you.
Good boy.
- I'm so glad you're back. - We're keeping him, right?
- I don't know. - Mom!
We're definitely keeping him.
translation.es: Claro que nos quedaremos con él.

translation.en: We're gonna bake cookies and play dress up and you can help me with ballet.
translation.es: Hornearemos galletas, nos disfrazaremos y me ayudarás con el ballet.

translation.en: Stop. You're scaring him.
♪ I feel love ♪
♪ All around ♪
♪ I can feel it ♪
♪ Shinin' down ♪
♪ It lights up the day Like the mornin' sun ♪
translation.es: Ilumina el día como el sol de la mañana

translation.en: ♪ Reachin' out and touchin' everyone ♪
translation.es: Se extiende y llega a todos

translation.en: ♪ I feel love ♪
♪ All day long ♪
♪ Like a promise ♪
♪ Like a song ♪
♪ And it's feelin' good ♪
♪ Like I knew it would ♪
♪ Everywhere I go ♪
♪ I feel love ♪
♪ If your heart believes in dreamin' ♪
translation.es: Si tu corazón cree en los sueños

translation.en: ♪ There's no other place I know ♪
♪ Well, life here rolls on by Without a care for tomorrow ♪
translation.es: La vida aquí sigue Sin importar el mañana

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, that was the life for me That was the life for me ♪
translation.es: Sí, esa era mi vida Esa era mi vida

translation.en: ♪ How long must I travel On this journey? ♪
♪ Guess I'll count a million stars Along the way ♪
translation.es: Supongo que contaré un millón de estrellas Al pasar

translation.en: ♪ And every time I start to worry ♪
translation.es: Y cada vez que comienzo a preocuparme

translation.en: ♪ Something whispers in my ear ♪
♪ Says the words I long to hear ♪
translation.es: Dice las palabras que quiero oír

translation.en: ♪ Almost home I'm almost home ♪
translation.es: Casi llego a casa Ya casi llego a casa

translation.en: ♪ Might be lost and afraid But I'm just a dream away ♪
translation.es: Podré estar perdido y asustado Pero estoy a un sueño de distancia

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home I'm almost home ♪
translation.es: Ya casi llego a casa Ya casi llego a casa

translation.en: ♪ Feel so cold and alone ♪
translation.es: Tengo tanto frío y estoy tan solo

translation.en: ♪ But I'm almost home ♪
translation.es: Pero ya casi llego a casa

translation.en: ♪ Just one more mile And I'll be home free ♪
translation.es: Solo un kilómetro más Y estaré libre en casa

translation.en: ♪ Just one more day Is all my heart needs ♪
translation.es: Un día más es lo que necesita mi corazón

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get there ♪
♪ Yeah, I'm gonna get there someday ♪
♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ On my own ♪
♪ Might be lost and afraid But I'll get there someday ♪
translation.es: Podré estar perdido y asustado Pero llegaré ahí algún día

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home Almost home ♪
translation.es: Ya casi llego a casa Casi llego a casa

translation.en: ♪ Feel so cold and alone But I'm... ♪
translation.es: Tengo tanto frío y estoy tan solo Pero...

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ I'm almost home ♪
Action.
Cut it.
